Text: Hey my good friend Nepotu.How are u dude.I just watch Sixers-Celtics game 7.And what a game it was..Oh man.The Heart of the Champion..Celtics with all of the problems,injuries and kinda old age exept Rondo and stuff but they still play a very good game.You know i would like to post earlier but i was afraid of this Mad man @Metallyous who posts the results and stuff and he did it again the damn psycho.!!!!:-/This guys is a nut case or he enjoys to ruin the fun of the people.!Now i first watch the games and then look at the coments because of him.!Anyways i would like to say a very big thanks for this game and like always a million thanks to the rippers and offcorse-Go Celtics-Go Celtics,to the Finals and above u still have and i know u can do this guys.Cheers.

@Dimmis80: You're welcome, man! Take your time to watch the game. No need to thank me. You've made it tens of times.
